name: Dino Runner 3D: Blob Clash
description:
Do you want to play the hero fighting monsters to protect the world?
Join the epic battle with Blob Clash 3D for exciting experiences like never before.
This rush runner is automatically running a giant game. Swipe to control movement and dodge obstacles in your way. Collect more coins as you play this clash. Use the money you collect from races for upgrades.
The first thing you need to do is assemble the largest crowd. You need to run alone then collect troops along the way, cleverly overcome dangerous traps along the way.
Try to collect a lot of gold on the bonus screen and you will exchange a lot of useful items.
HOW TO PLAY:
● Gather the biggest crowd
● Dodge traps along the way
● Fight with bosses
● Collect gold along the way
● Upgrade strength with gold
FEATURE:
● Lots of unique levels
● Extremely smooth swipe controls
● Bright, sharp graphics
● Dangerous traps and impossible obstacles
● Super smooth control
● Have fun and relax
● Free games
● Play anywhere without internet
See how far you can go in this race game clash! Run into the crowd until you gain the power to stay at the end. Crush your epic clash opponents in the ultimate battle!
Do you think you have the courage to take your mob through these crazy obstacles? Download the game to try your luck today!
